origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAPI.get_real_time_data', 'description': 'This function provides real-time economic data based on the country and the economic indicators requested.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the economic data is required.'}, {'name': 'economicIndicators', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of economic indicators, e.g., GDP, inflation.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'economicData', 'description': 'Real-time economic data for the requested indicators.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAPI.get_real_time_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'UK', 'economicIndicators'是['GDP', 'inflation'].
